snippet: The longtime sportscaster Marv Albert is excited for the Nets to begin playing in Brooklyn, the borough where he grew up.
abstract: Essay by longtime sportscaster Marv Albert describes his excitement as Brooklyn Nets begin playing in borough where he grew up.
lead_paragraph: The longtime sportscaster Marv Albert is excited for the Nets to begin playing in Brooklyn, the borough where he grew up.

headline.seo: Back Home in Brooklyn, Marv Albert Welcomes a New Resident
headline.main: Back Home in Brooklyn and Greeting a New Resident
headline.print_headline: Back Home in Brooklyn And Greeting a New Resident
